title: Moving Screen
body:
This always happens after I play a couple of games. When I try to click on something on the Lol main menu (the one you get to when you log in) I am unable to because ( I'm on Mac pro laptop so I have multiple 'desktops' so one desktop will have my safari running and the other lol main menu so I can just swipe on my touchpad to access either )
 it moves to another 'desktop/screen' aka the safari running desktop. So  I have to position my cursor on where the 
'play' button would be if I were on the Lol screen and swipe back to that desktop and fast click , may have to repeat 2-3 times for the click to finally get through. I HATE IT - WHAT IS THIS PROBLEM CALLED AND HOW CAN I FIX IT??? 

Hope I explained it so you understand the problem. Seems like a BUG but not in game.

replies.body: Unfortunately, I'm personally not too familiar with the specifics of touchscreen and desktop functions for Mac.  We would like to help though and see what we can do!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can figure this out with you!  We'll reply as soon as we can!
